verbs.description: metathesize (third-person singular simple present metathesizes, present participle metathesizing, simple past and past participle metathesized)

entries.meaning: (linguistics) To undergo or to subject to metathesis; of sounds, to switch positions in a word.
examples: Cases like mu·yh : mu·hyut may be accounted for under a rule that clusters of h plus sonorant metathesize in word-final position.
